Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Rosecrest Street, west of the Khelleva Estate.
Room.LongDescription: You are now walking along the borders of the Khelleva Estates. A short picket fence encloses the large land estate of the Khelleva Family. You can see the large mansion towards the south off of Khelleva Drive. Rosecrest continues to the northeast and southwest, but you can see that the road turns north up ahead.
